text: @ewarren @FredTJoseph DAY 28❤️ Severe anaphylaxis recovering 41 covid19 patients in that hospital ICU and I'm immunocompromised.Praying i dont get symptoms. I Wasnt able to afford allergy meds last month. Living off bread & butter sandwiches.Hope i am seen today #RENTRELIEF https://t.co/y4BcLsX5Ka https://t.co/LamWuyXZpg
